amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds to implement or enforce Corps of Engineers memo CERE-AP, issued by the South Atlantic division on July 9, 1996, relating to "Approval of Perpetual Beach Storm Damage Reduction Easement as a Standard Estate" which has halted beach renourishment projects across the country, including the aftermath of natural disasters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
